___aside.description: When true it means this block represents a portion of a document whose content is only indirectly related to the document's main content. Asides are frequently presented as sidebars or call-out boxes.

___updated_date.description: Represents an update that occurred on the node this block is attached to. DOES NOT indicate an update to the block itself. eg an article with a twitter block with updated_date means that the article was updated to include that twitter block.

___start_at_poster.description: When true the gallery should open at the poster image selected. This assumes the poster image is also in the selected gallery.

___css_class.description: In rendering environments that support HTML the css_class can be appended to the dom elements' class attribute.

___poster_image_ref.description: A reference to an image asset to use as the poster that will override what is provided by the target gallery.
